channel.title: Listicles – Accelerate
channel.description: Accelerate is a strategy and marketing agency aimed at making our clients visible and building their businesses.

item.title: My 5 Favorite Code Learning Resources
item.dc:creator: daniel
item.description: Skillcrush – just the best! Try Ruby – I love WHY! Jon Duckett – Best books on programming. Period. Rails Girls – Super cool, international code learning organization. Girl Develop It – Equally awesome in-person workshops all over the US. Code School – Great advanced tutorials and learning.
item.content:encoded:
1. Skillcrush – just the best!
  2. Try Ruby – I love WHY!
  3. Jon Duckett – Best books on programming. Period.
  4. Rails Girls – Super cool, international code learning organization.
  5. Girl Develop It – Equally awesome in-person workshops all over the US.
  6. Code School – Great advanced tutorials and learning.
